component.name: DLNA Downloader
component.summary: A user-friendly application to download media from DLNA-enabled devices
component.description: The DLNA Downloader provides an intuitive way to browse and download media from DLNA-enabled devices such as HDD videorecorders or TVs. If supported by the device, the DLNA Downloader shows you not only the title, but also the size, duration, date and channel the program was recorded on.
